scripts.gen-chain-metadata: pnpm exec papi add -w wss://testnet-passet-hub.polkadot.io pah
scripts.gen-contract-metadata: pnpm exec papi ink add metadata/ink_client.json
scripts.generate: pnpm run gen-chain-metadata && pnpm run gen-contract-metadata
scripts.prepack: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -rf .papi/descriptors/dist/* dist
